  • Research Proposals

Research Proposals

HospitiumRIS provides a structured system for creating, managing, and tracking research proposals through the entire lifecycle from draft to approval.

Overviewâ€‹

The proposal management system enables:

  • Structured proposal creation with templates
  • Co-investigator management with ORCID lookup
  • Milestone and deliverable tracking
  • Budget and funding management
  • Ethics documentation
  • Review workflow integration

Creating a Proposalâ€‹

Starting a New Proposalâ€‹

  1. Navigate to Projects â†’ Proposals â†’ Create
  2. Complete sections step-by-step
  3. Save as draft at any point
  4. Submit when complete

Proposal Sectionsâ€‹

The proposal form is organized into logical sections:

Section 1: Basic Informationâ€‹

Core Detailsâ€‹

FieldRequiredDescription
Titleâœ…Proposal title
Principal Investigatorâœ…Lead researcher name
PI ORCIDâŒORCID iD for verification
Abstractâœ…Brief project summary

Timelineâ€‹

FieldDescription
Start DateProposed project start
End DateProjected completion
DurationAuto-calculated

Departmentsâ€‹

Add all participating departments:

  • Primary department
  • Collaborating departments
  • External partners

Section 2: Research Teamâ€‹

Principal Investigatorâ€‹

The PI is automatically populated from your profile:

  • Name
  • ORCID iD
  • Institution
  • Department
  • Contact information

Co-Investigatorsâ€‹

Add team members with ORCID lookup:

  1. Click Add Co-Investigator
  2. Search by name or ORCID
  3. Select from results
  4. Assign role

ORCID Search Modalâ€‹

Team Rolesâ€‹

RoleDescription
Co-PIEqual leadership with PI
Co-InvestigatorSenior team member
CollaboratorContributing researcher
ConsultantExpert advisor
Research AssistantSupport role

Section 3: Research Detailsâ€‹

Research Areasâ€‹

Select applicable research areas:

  • Basic Science
  • Clinical Research
  • Translational Research
  • Public Health
  • Epidemiology
  • Health Services
  • Behavioral Science

Research Objectivesâ€‹

Document specific objectives:

1. Primary Objective
   - Determine the efficacy of treatment X in population Y

2. Secondary Objectives
   - Evaluate safety profile
   - Assess quality of life outcomes
   - Analyze cost-effectiveness

Methodologyâ€‹

Describe research methods:

  • Study design
  • Sample size and selection
  • Data collection methods
  • Analysis approach
  • Tools and technologies

Section 4: Project Managementâ€‹

Milestonesâ€‹

Track major project checkpoints:

MilestoneTarget DateStatus
Protocol finalizationMonth 3Pending
Ethics approvalMonth 4Pending
Recruitment startMonth 5Pending
Data collection completeMonth 18Pending
Analysis completeMonth 21Pending
Final reportMonth 24Pending

Adding Milestonesâ€‹

  1. Click Add Milestone
  2. Enter milestone name
  3. Set target date
  4. Add description (optional)
  5. Save

Deliverablesâ€‹

Define project outputs:

DeliverableTypeDue Date
Literature ReviewReportMonth 2
Protocol DocumentDocumentMonth 3
Interim ReportReportMonth 12
Publication DraftManuscriptMonth 20
Final ReportReportMonth 24

Section 5: Funding & Budgetâ€‹

Funding Informationâ€‹

FieldDescription
Funding SourceOrganization providing funds
Grant NumberGrant identifier (if known)
Funding InstitutionAdministering institution
Grant Start DateFunding period start
Grant End DateFunding period end
Total BudgetTotal funding amount

Budget Categoriesâ€‹

Typical budget breakdown:

CategoryAmountPercentage
Personnel$250,00050%
Equipment$75,00015%
Supplies$50,00010%
Travel$25,0005%
Other Direct$50,00010%
Indirect$50,00010%
Total$500,000100%

Section 6: Ethical Considerationsâ€‹

Ethics Overviewâ€‹

Describe ethical aspects:

  • Human subjects involvement
  • Animal research
  • Data privacy concerns
  • Risk mitigation

Consent Proceduresâ€‹

Document informed consent:

  • Consent form description
  • Consent process
  • Special populations (minors, vulnerable)
  • Waiver requests (if applicable)

Data Securityâ€‹

Outline data protection:

  • Data storage methods
  • Access controls
  • Encryption
  • Retention policy
  • Destruction procedures

Ethics Approvalâ€‹

FieldDescription
StatusPending, Approved, Exempt
Reference NumberIRB/Ethics committee number
CommitteeReviewing committee name
Approval DateDate approved

Section 7: Documentsâ€‹

Required Attachmentsâ€‹

Document TypeDescriptionStatus
Ethics DocumentsIRB approval, consent formsUpload
Data Management PlanData handling proceduresUpload
Budget JustificationDetailed budget explanationUpload
CV/BiosketchPI and key personnel CVsUpload
Letters of SupportCollaborator commitmentsUpload

Upload Processâ€‹

  1. Click Add Document
  2. Select document type
  3. Upload file (PDF, DOC, DOCX)
  4. Add description
  5. Save

Document Managementâ€‹

  • View uploaded files
  • Replace documents
  • Download documents
  • Delete documents

Section 8: Summaryâ€‹

Impact Statementâ€‹

Describe potential impact:

  • Scientific contribution
  • Clinical implications
  • Public health benefit
  • Training opportunities

Dissemination Planâ€‹

Outline results sharing:

  • Publication targets
  • Conference presentations
  • Community engagement
  • Data sharing plans

Related Publicationsâ€‹

Link existing publications:

  1. Click Link Publication
  2. Search library
  3. Select relevant publications
  4. Explain relevance

Related Manuscriptsâ€‹

Link ongoing manuscripts:

  • Collaborative manuscripts in progress
  • Related working papers

Proposal Statusâ€‹

Status Workflowâ€‹

Status Descriptionsâ€‹

StatusDescription
DRAFTBeing prepared, not submitted
SUBMITTEDSent for institutional review
UNDER_REVIEWBeing evaluated
APPROVEDAccepted, proceed with project
REJECTEDNot approved
REVISION_REQUESTEDRevisions required

Viewing & Editing Proposalsâ€‹

Proposal Listâ€‹

View all your proposals:

  • Filter by status
  • Sort by date, title
  • Quick actions

Proposal Detail Viewâ€‹

Comprehensive view of proposal:

  • All sections displayed
  • Attachment downloads
  • Status history
  • Reviewer feedback

Editing Draft Proposalsâ€‹

  1. Open proposal
  2. Click Edit
  3. Modify sections
  4. Save changes
Submitted Proposals

Submitted proposals cannot be edited. Contact admin if changes needed.

Liaison Communicationâ€‹

Email Thread Systemâ€‹

Communicate with reviewers:

  1. Navigate to Proposals â†’ Liaison
  2. View active threads
  3. Compose responses
  4. Track communication history

Thread Featuresâ€‹

  • Threaded conversations
  • Attachment support
  • Read receipts
  • Notification alerts

Best Practicesâ€‹

Writing Proposalsâ€‹

  1. Start with clear objectives
  2. Ensure methodology matches goals
  3. Justify budget thoroughly
  4. Address ethics proactively
  5. Review before submission

Team Buildingâ€‹

  1. Identify expertise gaps
  2. Use ORCID search for collaborators
  3. Define roles clearly
  4. Document contributions

Timeline Managementâ€‹

  1. Set realistic milestones
  2. Include buffer time
  3. Consider dependencies
  4. Update regularly

Document Preparationâ€‹

  1. Prepare documents early
  2. Follow formatting guidelines
  3. Get all required signatures
  4. Keep copies organized
